tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: I have consulted Dr.Nasbisathul Aarifa for the first time to get treatment for fever and body pain. I am very much satisfied about her way of approach and kindness towards me.. She really cared about my health because I didn't take food and went simply and she ignored to give injection and she was waiting for us to take food and then she started do inject.. I was happy to this kind of treatment.. May Almighty bless her and lead her to do the same service for all peoples those who are in need of treatment with friendliness..

Yesterday I had the opportunity to visit Adam's Clinic run by Dr Nabisathul Arifa when my daughter injured her head when a window grill hit her head.she developed swelling &severe pain . When we reached the clinic, around 9:00 p.m,the doctor had already left ,but the receptionist called her and she rushed to the Clinic within 10 mts,had a thorough examination ,comforted her and prescribed the essential medication.
It is indeed a blessing to have such a Dedicated & Caring Physician at the proximity of our house.. we are so grateful to her on attending on my daughter especially during this pandemic times and too at night leaving her children behind at home. And also avoiding an immediate CT scan, thereby saving us from shelling out too. My daughter is getting better,such a relief,may God bless the doctor and her  dedication to her profession.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
satisfaction
Doctor carrying like ‚Äúmom‚ÄùGood advisor superb treatment Without medicine doctors words clear your disease. Asking more questions anout health and prescribed medicines

No for online video calling, ( online consultation)  pls don't spend ur money. my granny is 78 old and she can't walk and so we book online consultation and  wen we had call and she is suggesting jus go to another doctor to step in and i have to pay 500 fees. if she can go y i m going to book appointment.online. ** ******** *** *** *** ** ***** ******* *************

Horrible experience. **** ****** ** **** ** * *** **** **** ******* She doesn't have time to talk to patients. She was not available during the scheduled time and I had to follow up. Finally, when she gave time, she acted as if she is doing a favour. She prescribed * **** ****** medicines for cold and fever, ***** **** *** *********
reply_text:
Sir,I don't make anyone wait nor if I am not available at that time ..I request the concern patient to come later or if they can't come , they can consult other doctors of their choice. 
Thank you

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Genuine treatment and accurate explanation. 

Good in all ways.

Doctor was available for consultation immediately as the patient was unable to even sit

Alhamdulillah. Had visited the right doctor for cold and stomach issues. Was completely satisfied by the way of approach to the patients, good listening skills, friendly and calm, well mannered and was using proper safety gears (mask, gloves and sanitizer etc.). Had very good diagnosis skills and prescribed proper medication and also suggested for precautions and natural remedies to take to avoid further issues. Thank you so much.

I went to the Dr for my Mrs 
Fever and For Some Other Problem 

Dr Treated very good 
Dr is very friendly and cared about patient health 
Good advice from dr 
Explanation great 
Very Satisfaction about dr
Very polite and friendly. Right guidance regarding health and fitness given. No over charging . helpful.
